resources.string: 30 Days of Recipes
Day
Ingredients and Cooking:
Classic Borsch
Traditional hearty soup with beets and beef.

Ingredients: Beef, beets, cabbage, potatoes, carrots, onions, tomato paste.

1. Boil the meat broth.
2. Sauté onions, carrots, and beets with tomato paste.
3. Add potatoes and cabbage to the broth.
4. Combine the sautéed mix with the broth and simmer for 15 minutes.
Milk Pancakes
Thin, lacy homemade pancakes for the whole family.

Ingredients: Milk 500ml, 3 eggs, flour 200g, sugar, salt, oil.

1. Whisk eggs with sugar and salt.
2. Gradually add milk and flour, whisking out lumps.
3. Add a spoon of oil to the batter.
4. Fry on a hot pan until golden brown.
Potato Pancakes (Draniki)
Crispy grated potato pancakes served with sour cream.

Ingredients: 5 potatoes, 1 egg, 2 tbsp flour, garlic, salt.

1. Grate potatoes finely and squeeze out excess juice.
2. Add egg, flour, and minced garlic.
3. Fry in oil until a golden crust forms.
Chicken Plov
Fragrant rice with juicy chicken and spices.

Ingredients: Rice 400g, chicken fillet 500g, carrots, onions, cumin, barberry.

1. Fry meat with onions and carrots in a pot.
2. Add washed rice and water (2cm above rice level).
3. Add spices and simmer on low heat until rice is cooked.
Cottage Cheese Pancakes (Syrniki)
Soft breakfast made of cottage cheese with vanilla aroma.

Ingredients: Cottage cheese 400g, 1 egg, 3 tbsp flour, sugar.

1. Mix cottage cheese with egg and sugar.
2. Form small patties and coat in flour.
3. Fry on both sides on low heat under a lid.
Herring under a Fur Coat
Layered festive salad with salted fish and vegetables.

Ingredients: Herring, potatoes, carrots, beets, eggs, onions, mayo.

1. Boil vegetables and eggs.
2. Dice herring, grate veggies.
3. Layer: herring, onion, potatoes, carrots, eggs, beets. Spread mayo between layers.
Mushroom Cream Soup
Creamy soup made of champignons and heavy cream.

Ingredients: Champignons 500g, cream 200ml, 2 potatoes, onion.

1. Sauté mushrooms with onions.
2. Boil potatoes, add mushrooms, and blend.
3. Pour in cream, salt, and heat for a few more minutes.
Navy-Style Pasta
Simple and filling pasta with sautéed minced meat.

Ingredients: Pasta 300g, minced meat 400g, onion, salt, pepper.

1. Boil the pasta.
2. Fry onions with minced meat until cooked.
3. Mix pasta with meat and heat together for 5 minutes.
Homemade Dumplings (Pelmeni)
Traditional dough dish with juicy meat filling.

Ingredients: Flour, water, egg, minced meat, onion.

1. Knead firm dough.
2. Mix meat with finely chopped onion.
3. Roll out dough, cut circles, and fold dumplings.
4. Boil for 5-7 minutes after they float.
Okroshka on Kvass
Refreshing summer cold soup.

Ingredients: Sausage, cucumber, radish, potatoes, eggs, herbs, kvass.

1. Dice all ingredients into small cubes.
2. Mix in a pot with plenty of herbs.
3. Pour cold kvass before serving.
Cabbage Rolls (Golubtsi)
Minced meat and rice wrapped in tender cabbage leaves.

Ingredients: Cabbage, meat, rice, onion, tomato paste.

1. Blanch cabbage leaves.
2. Mix meat with parboiled rice.
3. Wrap the filling in leaves.
4. Simmer in tomato-sour cream sauce for 40 minutes.
Olivier Salad
Main festive salad with potatoes and peas.
Ingredients: Potatoes, carrots, sausage, eggs, pickles, peas, mayo.\n\n1. Boil veggies and eggs. 2. Dice everything into small cubes. 3. Mix with peas and dress with mayo.
Vegetable Stew
Light dietary dish made of seasonal vegetables.
Ingredients: Zucchini, eggplant, bell pepper, tomato, onion.\n\nChop everything coarsely and simmer in a pan with oil until soft, adding garlic and herbs.
Baked Fish
Fish fillet with lemon and rosemary in foil.
Take a fillet of white fish or salmon. Salt, drizzle with lemon juice, add a sprig of rosemary. Wrap in foil and bake for 20 minutes at 180C.
Apple Sharlotka
Simple and quick apple sponge cake.
Ingredients: 3 eggs, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup flour, 3 apples.\n\n1. Whisk eggs with sugar. 2. Gently fold in flour. 3. Slice apples, pour batter over them, and bake for 40 minutes.
Pork Goulash
Meat chunks in thick gravy with paprika.
Fry meat with onions, add plenty of paprika, flour for thickness, and water. Simmer under a lid for 1 hour until tender.
Cottage Cheese Casserole
Tastes like childhood: soft cheese and raisins.
Mix cottage cheese, semolina, egg, and raisins. Let sit for 20 mins for semolina to swell. Bake until a golden crust forms.
Ukha Fish Soup
Classic fish soup with clear broth.
Ingredients: Fish (pike or salmon), potatoes, onion, carrot, parsley root.\n\n1. Boil fish, remove it, and strain broth. 2. Add veggies. 3. Return fish to pot, add herbs, and let rest.
Shchi Soup
Traditional Russian soup with fresh cabbage.
Ingredients: Beef, cabbage, potatoes, tomatoes, onion, carrot.\n\n1. Boil beef broth. 2. Add fresh cabbage and potatoes. 3. Add sautéed veggies. 4. Simmer for 30-40 minutes.
Chicken Kiev
Chicken fillet with a piece of cold butter inside.
Flatten chicken breast, wrap cold herb butter inside. Double bread the roll and deep fry until crispy.
Vinaigrette Salad
Traditional salad with pickles and beets.
Boiled beets, carrots, potatoes, peas, and pickles. Dress with fragrant sunflower oil.
French Style Meat
Baked layers of meat, potatoes, and cheese.
Ingredients: Pork, potatoes, onion, cheese, mayo.\n\n1. Slice and tenderize meat. 2. Layer: meat, onion rings, potatoes. 3. Spread mayo and top with cheese. 4. Bake for 45 minutes.
Pumpkin Cream Soup
Bright and warming soup with seeds.
Roast pumpkin, blend with cream and ginger. Serve with roasted pumpkin seeds.
Beef Stroganoff
Thin strips of beef in a sour cream sauce.
Flash-fry beef, add onions and plenty of sour cream. Simmer briefly so the meat stays tender.
Cottage Cheese Pierogi
Soft dough with sweet cottage cheese filling.
Ingredients: Flour, water, cottage cheese, sugar, egg yolk.\n\n1. Knead elastic dough. 2. Mix cheese with sugar and yolk. 3. Form pierogi and boil for 4-5 mins.
Mimosa Salad
Layered salad with canned fish and grated eggs.
Ingredients: Canned fish, boiled eggs, cheese, butter, onion.\n\nLayers: egg whites, cheese, fish, mayo, onions, egg yolks. Top with frozen butter shavings.
Guryev Porridge
Traditional Russian dessert: semolina with milk skins and nuts.
Ingredients: Semolina, milk, honey, nuts, dried fruits.\n\n1. Cook thick semolina. 2. Bake milk for skins. 3. Layer porridge and skins with nuts. 4. Bake in the oven.
Potato Casserole
Hearty homemade dish with potatoes and minced meat.
Ingredients: Mashed potatoes, minced meat, onion, cheese.\n\n1. Layer half the mash in a dish. 2. Add fried meat with onions. 3. Cover with rest of mash, top with cheese and bake.
Homemade Lemonade
Refreshing drink made of lemons and mint.
Squeeze 3 lemons, mix with water, sugar, and mint. Add ice and lemon slices.
Sour Cream Cake (Smetannik)
Classic tender cake based on sour cream.
Ingredients: Sour cream, sugar, flour, eggs.\n\n1. Make dough with sour cream, flour, and eggs. Bake crusts. 2. For cream, whisk sour cream with sugar. 3. Assemble and let soak.
